ComicInfo.Penciller: Pete Morisi,Steve Ditko,Pete Morisi,Steve Ditko,Carlos Vila
ComicInfo.Summary:
Surprise!: Sam Jordan learns an ancient Tibetan trick to freeze all living things within the sound of his voice by a magical chant. He turns to crime. Too bad he doesn't know that snakes are deaf.
An Act of Treason: During the Revolutionary War Leeds has an innocent man hanged. The innocent man's ghost seeks revenge.
Are Zombies Real?: How Hungan's produce 'real' zombies.
The Evil One: Twin brothers plan to marry a village woman to complete their father's will and receive his inheritance. Turns out the girl is a vampire and she ends up with the money.
ComicInfo.Title: Surprise!; An Act of Treason; Are Zombies Real?; The Evil One
